content.p: We are committed to supporting you through your career at the University. As we recognise the importance of career progression, a wide range of professional courses are available, helping you to excel in your chosen career. We also offer competitive pension schemes to all employees alongside other benefits, including immediate life cover for your beneficiaries and ill health retirement benefits. The University offers various pensions schemes. The one you are eligible to join will depend on your grade and position. Contributing to your pension allows you to build up a pot of money to provide for yourself and your family in retirement. As well as your contributions, the University contributes too, and you will receive tax relief. For further information see our pension web pages.
